scripts.test: npm run clear-results & wdio run wdio.conf.ts & npm run report
scripts.apply: npm run clear-results & wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec test/specs/ApplyHere.ts
scripts.maxInstalment: npm run clear-results & wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec test/specs/MaxSampleInstalment.ts
scripts.schedule: npm run clear-results & wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec test/specs/PaymentSchedule.ts
scripts.instalment: npm run clear-results & wdio run wdio.conf.ts --spec test/specs/SampleInstalment.ts
